title: Shukyuden - Field no Okami FW Jin
original_name: -蹴球伝-フィールドの狼 FW 陣!
sinopse: Jin Hamukai is a young guy who likes to play football just for money. But after the death of his parents and his brother Ryota, who dreamed to be a football star, he decides to realize his brother's dream and play football to be a great footballer (the football wolf).
